body:
Hi Mostapha, thanks for your reply!



I assume the name of glazing is useful when we want to compare the results for specific glazing surfaces, or understand the "behavior" of a particular glazing such as heat transfer before and after we change its materials or constructions.



Can you kindly advise the ways to access and assign glazing name?



Moreover, may I ask if there is a way to filter zones or surfaces by their names. For example, I have several zones named in this convention: zone_[floor]_[roomType]_[orientation] (e.g. zone_floor01_Bedroom_east). So, how to choose those all the bedrooms facing west from floor 02-05 by their names to visualize results for these zones or to edit their zone properties?



I hope my explanation is clear...



Thanks!
